summary: Barca have no plans to replace Luis Enrique
aspect: 1. Barcelona president Josep Maria Bartomeu insists La Liga leaders have no plans to replace Luis Enrique, who is very happy with his performance. 2. explain: Barcelona president Josep Maria Bartomeu confirmed that there are no plans to replace Luis Enrique, who is content with his performance.
